document.full_text: producers for the broadway production of the neil labute play "fat pig" said that they were postponing the show's opening until the 2011-2012 season after losing a "key investment."
document.title: 'fat pig' will not open on broadway this season
lines_and_colors: producers for the broadway production of the neil labute play "fat pig" said that they were postponing the show's opening until the 2011-2012 season after losing a "key investment."
